PDC main functions

order_variables

Compute Ordering Sequence

pdc

Model Selection based on PDC algorithm

Simulation functions

run_simulation

Generic function used to run each simulation

simulate_data

Simulation y and X

Helpers

construct_cov_matrix

Covariance matrix used for X

find_select

Find index of selected variables

get_X

Simulate design matrix X

ggplot_like_colors

Get ggplot2-like colors

hit

Num

is_correct

Verify if the correct model is selected

is_included

Verify if the selected model is included in the correct model

L2.2

Squared L2 norm

median_multivariate_cov_bootstrap

Bootstrap estimation of the covariance matrix of median vector

median_se_boostrap

Bootstrap estimation of the standard error of the median

MSE

Estimator of the mean squared error

nb_correct

Number of correct variables selected

nb_false_pos

Number of non-significant variables selected

nb_selected

Number of false positive

nb_signif

Number of false positive
